text: a bahudaiva vadikal parayum: "allahu icchiccirunnenkil nannalea nannalute purvapitakkalea bahudaivavisvasikalakumayirunnilla. nannal onnum nisid'dhamakkumayirunnumilla.” aprakaram tanne avarkk mumpullavarum nam'mute siksa anubhavikkuvealam satyatte tallipparannu. parayuka: "ninnalute vasam nannalkk velippetuttittaravunna valla vivaravumuntea? uhatte matraman ninnal pinparrunnat. ninnal kevalam anumanannalaviskarikkukayan.”
